## ITransferManager.downloadArrayBuffer() method

Downloads a binary object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
downloadArrayBuffer(url: RequestInfo, init?: RequestInit): Promise<ArrayBuffer>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | RequestInfo | The URL to download |
|  init | RequestInit | Optional extra parameters for the download |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ArrayBuffer&gt;
